thread.title: Tyler Hilton and Megan Park Tie the Knot
thread.title_full: Tyler Hilton and Megan Park Tie the Knot

title: Tyler Hilton and Megan Park Tie the Knot
text:
Tyler Hilton and Megan Park Tie the Knot Posted just a moment ago 
Michael Yarish/CBS (LOS ANGELES) -- Tyler Hilton and Megan Park got hitched in Malibu Canyon, California, on Saturday, the couple tells Us Weekly . 
The Extant actor, 31, and the Secret Life of the American Teenager star, 29, exchanged vows at the Triunfo Creek Vineyards in front of an intimate gathering of family and friends, including co-stars Shailene Woodley and Zoe Kazan. The couple's friend, actress Missi Pyle, officiated. 
“It was everything we wanted it to be and it was so nice after so many years together to finally celebrate our relationship with all of our friends and family,” Park tells the entertainment magazine. “It’s nice to have everyone we love in one place finally for all these years to celebrate our love for each other.” 
The couple exchanged personalized vows during the simple ceremony, which featured a maid of honor and best man, but no bridesmaids and groomsmen. 
“We felt like there were so many people that we would want to have, include in it, but we decided to sort of keep it simple and just have a maid of honor and best man and be happy that everybody else was there,” Park explains. 
“We have a lot of barbecues and hangs with our friends and family and we wanted this to kind of feel the same way, but just at this winery,” Hilton says of the fall-themed affair, which included a food truck, a bluegrass band, and even ping-pong tables for the guests. “We just kind of were throwing a little party that we’d want to be at!” 
The former One Tree Hill star first met Park on the set of the 2007 film Charlie Bartlett , and they announced their engagement in 2014. 
Hilton, who is also a country musician, will kick off a concert tour in December. 
Park will next star opposite Dwayne “The Rock” Johnson, Aaron Paul, and Kevin Hart in the comedy Central Intelligence , due out in 2016.
